channel.title: Projects on Kris Wu's Humble Site
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Kris Wu's Humble Site

item.title: Are co-morbidities and ICU admissions a death sentence?
item.description: The UK’s 3rd nation-wide pandemics lockdown is scheduled 14th October. It will be very unfortunate to get infected the virus, especially that a cold winter is approaching. Let’s look at the likelihood of death if you get them. The point is not to scare you, but to warn you to be careful!!! Load packages library(tidyverse) # Load ggplot2, dplyr, and all the other tidyverse packages library(mosaic) library(ggthemes) library(lubridate) library(here) library(skimr) library(janitor) library(httr) library(readxl) library(vroom) Download and clean data frame # URL link to CDC to download data url <- "https://data.

item.title: Is there a correlation between movie gross revenue and ratings?
item.description: I am a fan of movies, not only movies themselves but the numbers of how they have performed, both in ratings and box office. Nonetheless, this is my first ever attempt to look at movie data with R! Load packages library(tidyverse) # Load ggplot2, dplyr, and all the other tidyverse packages library(mosaic) library(ggthemes) library(lubridate) library(fivethirtyeight) library(here) library(skimr) library(janitor) library(vroom) library(tidyquant) library(rvest) # scrape websites library(purrr) library(lubridate) #to handle dates Load data and take a look movies <- read_csv(here::here("data", "movies.

item.title: Which country is the best sales destination for alcohol?
item.description: I was talking to a German friend one day about how good German are at drinking alcohol, he said “the Chinese moutai is nothing”. While taste is kind of personal, I did not feel offended as we were drinking and telling nonsense as well. That was back in Denmark where student orientations typically have challenge activities such as drinking 6 litres of beer. Now, I am intrigued to find out how nationals of different countries love beer, spirits or wine.

item.title: Which stock has the best return per unit risk?
item.description: As a finance student, it is interesting to look at time series data and decide which index to invest. We shall see, for this page, how the NYSE-listed stocks performed. Load packages library(tidyverse) # Load ggplot2, dplyr, and all the other tidyverse packages library(mosaic) library(ggthemes) library(lubridate) library(fivethirtyeight) library(here) library(skimr) library(janitor) library(vroom) library(tidyquant) library(rvest) # scrape websites library(purrr) library(lubridate) #to handle dates Load data nyse <- read_csv(here::here("data","nyse.csv")) First, it is a good practice to see what example industries the stocks belong to.
